General.Name: Intuitive Investments Group Plc
General.Description: Intuitive Investments Group Plc intends to invest in early and later-stage life sciences businesses operating primarily in the United Kingdom, continental Europe, and the United States. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 20-22 Wenlock Road, London, United Kingdom, N1 7GU
